tool_description: Tracks crop development stages based on planting date, variety, and accumulated growing conditions to predict phenological events.

crop_type.description: Type of crop: corn, wheat, soybeans, rice, cotton, potatoes, tomatoes, or barley

accumulated_gdd.description: Accumulated growing degree days since planting

moisture_stress.description: Whether crop is experiencing moisture stress

nutrient_stress.description: Whether crop is experiencing nutrient stress

error_messages: Unsupported crop type: Use one of the supported crop types from the list.
Invalid planting date: Planting date cannot be in the future or more than 1 year ago.
Invalid current date: Current date must be after planting date.
Invalid GDD value: Accumulated growing degree days must be non-negative.
Insufficient GDD data: Need at least some accumulated growing degree days to determine stage.
usage: Provide crop details, planting date, current date, and accumulated growing degree days. Optional stress indicators help refine predictions. Returns current growth stage and timing predictions.
